questions.question: She is greedy …………………………… dishonest.
questions.description: As well as is similar to both...and..

questions.question: The cow as well as the goat ……………………….. us milk.
questions.description: When we connect two singular nouns with as well as, the verb is singular.

questions.question: The thief as well as his helper ……………………………. caught.
questions.description: When we connect two singular nouns with as well as, the verb is singular.

questions.question: The teachers as well as the principal …………………………….. there.
questions.description: When you connect a plural and a singular noun with as well as, the verb agrees with the first subject in number.

questions.question: Sam as well as his friends ……………………………. arrived.
questions.description: When you connect a plural and a singular noun with as well as, the verb agrees with the first subject in number.

questions.question: Mira as well as Rina ……………………………… gone to the movies.
questions.description: When we connect two singular nouns with as well as, the verb is singular.

questions.question: Animals as well as plants …………………………….. food and water.
Elephants are found in India …………………………… in Africa.
Small plants as well as big trees ……………………………. perished in the drought.
Sonia as well as her parents ........................................ been invited.
